fields.summary: enable LLAP cache affinity by default

status.name: Closed

fields.description:
SplitLocationProvider removes HDFS locality in LLAP, causing more network traffic when reading file formats which aren't currently cached.

In the absence of the IO elevator, cache affinity should be disabled.

This information is encoded into the MapWork in deriveLlapIoDescString, move this to an Enum type for comparisons.
fields.summary: LLAP: Ignore cache-affinity if the LLAP IO elevator is disabled

comments.body: Why is some inputs false? +1 otherwise pending tests
Not sure if that ever gets triggered, but it is pretty much a toss-up on whether to force affinity or not.
